concept.title: 5301.602-3 Ratification of Unauthorized Commitments

li.p: (2) Ratification approval authority is delegated as follows (see MP5301.601(a)(i)):
(A) The SCO for actions equal to or greater than $30,000.
(B) The COCO for actions less than $30,000 (not redelegable).
